q: MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained`` more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers.'' The article asks, Will that trend continue when the CEO crown soon shifts from Eric Schmidt to Google co-founder Larry Page? While there's no reason to think Google would kill off Google Apps, there are scenarios that could trouble enterprise customers, Gartner analysts say. Google investors could conceivably push the company to spin out the Google

Eric Schmidt , who told CNN last year that people who don't want their homes photographed for Google Street View could`` just move.'' Eric Schmidt also passed along this comforting gem to The Atlantic: We know where you are. We know where you've been. We can more or less know what you're thinking about. Yikes. Of course, Eric Schmidt has since been kicked upstairs to`` executive chairman,'' and Google co-founder Larry Page will take over day-to-day operations in April. Former ITV Granada Head of Development Siobhan Greene - nicknamed` Shoe'- then took the award from Simon Cowell and told the audience: It's brilliant to be alive. She is married to Stockport-raised Nigel Hall, who was controller of entertainment at Granada until 2003 when the company was merged with Carlton.
